author: Courtney Reagan
title: Target raises its minimum wage to $13 an hour, with goal of reaching $15 by end of 2020
description: Target says it is increasing its minimum hourly wage by a dollar to $13 in June for all current and new employees as part of its goal to hit $15 an hour by the end of 2020.
